TEXT.S: = Silupatun = Gaga mniq Hwareyseyn Cwosisyang ka alang Silupatun. 61 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 181 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 96% niqan 174 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 4% niqan 7 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Bunun88%, Amis1%, Paiwan2%, Truku1%, Seejiq/Seediq/Seejiq/Seejiq/Sediq1%, ni rahuq na o4%.
